item.title: Model definition
item.description: This is my model: A Markov forward process \(q(x_t|x_{t-1})\) defined in Equation eq:forward-process. \begin{equation} \label{eq:forward-process} q(x_t|x_{t-1}) = \text{Cat}(x_t, p = x_{t-1}Q_{t-1}) \end{equation}
